content:
DATADIR Enum

Definition

Specifies the direction of the data flow in the dwDirection parameter of the stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.EnumFormatEtc* method. This determines the formats that the resulting enumerator can enumerate.

In this Article

public enum DATADIR
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
DATADIR

Remarks

For more information about DATADIR, see the MSDN Library.

The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions.

Fields

DATADIR_GET

Requests that stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.EnumFormatEtc* supply an enumerator for the formats that can be specified in stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.GetData*.
DATADIR_SET

Requests that stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.EnumFormatEtc* supply an enumerator for the formats that can be specified in stem.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDataObject.SetData*.
